author: janb
msg: Update for changes to remove AbstractStateManageable and replace with use of AbstractManagedObject

author: jboynes
msg: Allow component context to be inherited by threads

author: jboynes
msg: Change to file: URLs to avoid reverse DNS problems

author: jstrachan
msg: Initial checkin of a simple swing JMX console using GroovySwing for the painting of the views.
It should be pretty easy to add some custom Geronimo views or add some simple JSR 77 /  88 screens etc.

author: jstrachan
msg: Enabled the JMX RMI connector by default so that Geronimo is introspectable by any JMX tool.
We should switch this over to JSR 160 ASAP and use that instead
